subject: Stanley Cup
Television
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Games 1 and 2 of the Stanley Cup finals drew good TV ratings in New York and Los Angeles, but if the Devils can’t mount a comeback, these finals may be the least watched in the past five years.
snippet: Games 1 and 2 of the Stanley Cup finals drew good TV ratings in New York and Los Angeles, but if the Devils can’t mount a comeback, these finals may be the least watched in the past five years.
